description: Standardized Definitions for Governance Fallback Mechanisms (GFRM) utilized by GSEP agents for resilience, state synchronization, and deterministic error handling.

GFRM:HALT_PROTOCOL.description: Protocol failed early validation or critical integrity check; immediately halt and terminate execution.

GFRM:INIT_ROLLBACK_SST_PREV.description: Initiate rollback to the previously stable system state (SST_PREV), utilizing known security checkpoints.

GFRM:RECALCULATE_CONTEXT.description: Context synthesis or synchronization failed; attempt recalculation of the specified stage up to the configured limit.

GFRM:LOG_AND_TRANSITION_S_04.description: Constraint failure detected; log the event and transition control flow to the target stage (S_04) to derive new viability metrics or recovery path.
